mapper.select: select r.EQUIP_SEQ, e. EQUIP_NAME, count(r.EQUIP_SEQ), img.PHYSICALFILE_NAME from RESERVATION r, equip_image img, equip e where r.EQUIP_SEQ = img.SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ and e.EQUIP_SEQ = r.EQUIP_SEQ group by r.EQUIP_SEQ ORDER BY COUNT( r.EQUIP_SEQ ) DESC LIMIT 3

select e.EQUIP_SEQ ,e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ ,e.MANUFACTURER ,e.DESCRIPTION ,e.MANAGER ,e.EQUIP_NAME ,e.AVAILABLE ,sc.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME ,img.PHYSICALFILE_NAME from SUB_CATEGORY sc , EQUIP e LEFT OUTER JOIN EQUIP_IMAGE img ON e.EQUIP_SEQ = img.SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ where e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = sc.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ and e.VISIBLE = 'T' order by e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ, e.EQUIP_SEQ

select e.EQUIP_SEQ ,e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ ,e.MANUFACTURER ,e.DESCRIPTION ,e.MANAGER ,e.EQUIP_NAME ,e.AVAILABLE ,sc.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME ,img.PHYSICALFILE_NAME from SUB_CATEGORY sc , EQUIP e LEFT OUTER JOIN EQUIP_IMAGE img ON e.EQUIP_SEQ = img.SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ where e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = sc.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ and e.VISIBLE = 'T' and e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = #{SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ} order by e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ, e.EQUIP_SEQ
select CATEGORY_SEQ ,CATEGORY_NAME from CATEGORY where VISIBLE = 'T'

select e.EQUIP_SEQ , e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ , e.MANUFACTURER , e.DESCRIPTION , e.MANAGER , e.EQUIP_NAME , e.AVAILABLE , img.PHYSICALFILE_NAME , img.ATTACHFILE_SEQ from EQUIP e LEFT OUTER JOIN EQUIP_IMAGE img on e.EQUIP_SEQ = img.SOURCE_UNIQUE_SEQ where e.EQUIP_SEQ = #{EQUIP_SEQ}
